attributes.action: Stop all foreign aid with immediate effect: audit all government spending.
attributes.additional_details:
It has become apparent that like the USA the UK is wasting tax payers money on foreign aid programs. At a time when there is a cost of living crisis, senior citizens have been denied the winter fuel payment, the budget has had a negative affect on business and the British people are struggling to make ends meet. It is not acceptable to waste money.
All Foreign Aid should be reviewed in line with British values and British interests. Aid should be just that, we will help in a crisis or disaster.
attributes.background: Stop all foreign aid: stop all money leaving the UK. Review all spending that does not benefit the UK and the British people as a whole.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700263
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705222
